subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Hee Kyung Seo ran away with the inaugural Kia Classic for her first L.P.G.A.  Tour title, shooting a two-under 70 on Sunday for a six-stroke win in a final round marked by Michelle Wie’s latest rules gaffe.
snippet: Hee Kyung Seo ran away with the inaugural Kia Classic for her first L.P.G.A.  Tour title, shooting a two-under 70 on Sunday for a six-stroke win in a final round marked by Michelle Wie’s latest rules gaffe.
